home.introduction: Hello, We are Thai Student Association in the Republic of Korea

hero.maintext:
TSAK serves as a central organization for public relations, supports, and activities for Thai students throughout the Republic of Korea.
The mission is to promote the exchange of knowledge and perspectives, and to foster unity and solidarity among Thai students.
The Association also acts as an official liaison with the Royal Thai Embassy and external organizations, while providing guidance, consultation, and assistance to Thai students across all regions of the Republic of Korea.
